name: Éire Engraved - medium circle
description:
Éire (Ireland)  The three-sided Trinity knot is a very famous and ancient symbol of Ireland. It represents balance, strength and eternity. It can be found throughout Celtic design, craft and writing.

[Material]  Sterling Silver 925

[Size]  
head: approx. 13mm, 4.0g  
chain: 40+5cm(adjuster)

[Product number]  2331A003

[Contact]  info@isle-jewellery.com

Please allow up to 4 weeks (including delivery time) for these hand engraved pieces. We appreciate your patience.

options.name: Default

name: Lása K18 Square Pendant
description:
Lása (lace)  
These delicate pieces were inspired by the traditional and elegant knot work and weaving from the ancient Book of Kells.  Also reflected in these designs is the Irish lace that was handmade by women during the Irish Potato Famine (1845-1849) to help support their families.

[Material]   18K Yellow Gold  
Rose gold and white gold also available by request

[Size]  head: approx.21mm, 3.0g
(chain not included)

[Product number]  1321A002K

[Contact]  info@isle-jewellery.com

Please allow 2-3 weeks for hand finishing and delivery time.

name: Fionn Square cufflinks
description:
Fionn (fair/light)  Simple, modern and unique.  
This collection is based on the amazing natural stone of the Giant's Causeway, a World Heritage Site in the north of Ireland. The unusual shaped stone was created by an ancient volcano and inspired the angular shaped of this collection.


[Material]  Sterling Silver 925

[Size]   head: approx.14x17mm, 12.0g(pair)

[Product number]  1611A002

[Contact]  info@isle-jewellery.com

Please allow 2-3 weeks for hand finishing and delivery time.
